Package de.oth.blocklib.renderer

Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Animal, Arrow, Ball, Billboard, Bird, BlockMesh, Bull, Cat, ClientAvatar, Cloud, DebugGridRenderable, DeferredLight, DoubleBufferedUIRenderable, Dragon, EasyExecuteProgram.TestEntity, Entity, EntityGraphMarker, ExplosiveArrow, FluidMesh, FluidMesh, FlyingRock, GBufferShader.GBufferVisualizer, HandItem, Human, InteractiveItem, Line, MagicalBroom, MagicBox, Monster, Npc, Owl, Pig, Player, Precipitation, PursuitVillager, RenderDemoProgram.DemoObject, RenderedRenderable, Schnatz, ShaderDemo.DemoObject, Skybox, Spider, TextBillboard, UIRenderable, Unicorn, Villager, Weapon, WorldItem, Zombie
public interface Renderable
Interface for all objects that should be rendered.
Author:
Tobias Werner WiSe17/18
See Also:
MasterRenderer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void draw()
    Sets this Renderable to be rendered the next frame.
    default org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f[] getJointMatrices()
    Returns this Renderables joint matrices.
    Material[] getMaterials()
    Returns all Materials this Renderable should be rendered with
    RawModel getModel()
    Returns the model of this object
    org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getTransformationMatrix()
    Returns this Renderables model matrix
    default org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getWorldPosition()
    Returns this Renderables position in world space coordinates

  • Method Details

    • getModel

      RawModel getModel()
      Returns the model of this object
      Returns:
      RawModel of this object

    • getMaterials

      Material[] getMaterials()
      Returns all Materials this Renderable should be rendered with
      Returns:
      Array of all Materials this Renderable should be rendered with

    • getJointMatrices

      default org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f[] getJointMatrices()
      Returns this Renderables joint matrices. Only used for animated models.
      Returns:
      Array of joint matrices

    • getWorldPosition

      default org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getWorldPosition()
      Returns this Renderables position in world space coordinates
      Returns:
      position of this Renderable in world space coordinates

    • getTransformationMatrix

      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getTransformationMatrix()
      Returns this Renderables model matrix
      Returns:
      model matrix of this Renderable
      See Also:
      Transformation

    • draw

      default void draw()
      Sets this Renderable to be rendered the next frame.
